thing.title: Teapot
thing.author: syvwlch
thing.description: Felt like doing something a bit more complicated than a cup, so I went for a teapot.All shaped in TopMod, subdivided/smoothed in Blender.I'll be working on variants of this for a while... improving the spout, adding a mesh to hold the tea leaves back, and internal supports so it can be printed as is.
